name: The Final Mix Effect Episode 1
description:
The Final Mix Effect Episode 1 is the first part of a visual novel series that focuses on you. You are awakened in a lab but to your surprise you and a small laptop are the only people that you know of at the moment.

Includes:

  • Robot voice acting
  • Choices to make
  • And some cool story

The next episode will most likely be released in approximately 2 more or 3 more months after this one if given enough support.
